scripts.postinstall: yarn workspace @sosa/core build && yarn workspace @sosa/agent build
scripts.build: yarn workspace @sosa/core build && yarn workspace @sosa/agent build && tsc -p nodes/tsconfig.json && yarn workspace @sosa/server build
scripts.dev: yarn workspace @sosa/core build && yarn workspace @sosa/agent build && concurrently -k -n core,agent,server,frontend -c blue,yellow,green,magenta "yarn dev:core" "yarn dev:agent" "yarn dev:server" "yarn dev:frontend"
